Title: 37136 - # DIY Projects Moms Can Do to Spruce Up Their Front Yard
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 DIY projects that moms can do to spruce up their front yard. You can talk about things like mail box decorating, simple gardening and landscaping, lawn ornaments and bird houses, etc. Anything that moms could easily do to help make their front yard more inviting. Your reference links will give you plenty of ideas to discuss. Your target audience is moms who are interested in DIY projects, as this article will be placed on a blog specifically for moms. You can link to the target URL by suggesting decorating your mailbox to match the seasons.
